ygData.subject: Re: Specialization.. is it working?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have trained in specialization.  Being a wizard, I dumped most my training points into Evoke, though I put a point into all 5 to get the basics.  I am now 52
ygData.messageBody:
I have trained in specialization. Being a wizard, I dumped most my training
points into Evoke, though I put a point into all 5 to get the basics. I am
now 52 in Evoke and 24 or 25 in the other four skills. I have also seen
Specialize: Evoke and Specialize: Abjure go up from use since training in
them. As I recall, they were somewhere in the middle on the of the list of
trainable skills. I think it goes combat/usable skills, specialize skills,
trade skills, language skills from top to bottom in the trainers list.

-Shadowwalker of Karana
Level 24 Wizard


> Well the patch update says that specialization is now in place, but I
still
> cannot train in it at my guild. I asked in game and several other people
> also could not train in it. Simply does not show up in the list. Has
> anyone succesfully trained in this yet?
